official_title: To provide appropriate authority to the Department of Justice Inspector General to investigate attorney misconduct, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Justice Inspector General Authority Improvement Act of 2009
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

summary.text: Department of Justice Inspector General Authority Improvement Act of 2009 - Amends the Inspector General Act of 1978 to eliminate restrictions on the authority of the Inspector General of the Department of Justice (DOJ) to refer allegations of misconduct involving DOJ attorneys, investigators, or law enforcement personnel to the Office of Professional Responsibility.
